forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
